column2: outplot <- ggplot(data = plotdata, aes(x = size, y= time, group = 1)) + geom_line(colour = "red") + geom_point(colour = "black") + geom_point(data = plotdata[h,], aes(x = size, y= time), colour = "blue") + labs(title="Graph of Time per Access as a Function of Buffer Size", x ="Buffer Size (KB)", y = "Time per Access (ns)") + xscale("log2", .format = TRUE) +
